changeSet.author: Norman
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE person( id BIGSERIAL PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, identity_code VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL UNIQUE, first_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, last_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, date_of_birth DATE NOT NULL, time_of_registration TIMESTAMP DEFAULT LOCALTIMESTAMP(0) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT first_name_not_empty CHECK (REGEXP_REPLACE(first_name, '\s+$', '') <> ''), CONSTRAINT last_name_not_empty CHECK (REGEXP_REPLACE(last_name, '\s+$', '') <> ''), CONSTRAINT date_of_birth_less_than_registration CHECK (date_of_birth < DATE(time_of_registration)) );
